attributes.review: I got this app hoping to find a reason to vote for Trump I didn’t find much just a bunch of censored news articles and such and I got really annoyed that there was no option to not enter my phone number because now I’m getting a bunch of calls and texts and it’s just real annoying
attributes.title: Eh

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch so bad. I was trying to see if I could find any reason at all to vote for trump but the way he is handling this pandemic, the fact he’s racist, sexist, misogynistic, and just all around hateful... I can’t even do it man. I don’t wanna vote for Biden either but anything is better than trump at this point.
attributes.title: Zero stars

attributes.review: I downloaded this to respect the memory of our late president, RIP Trump, but my phone was hacked and now I have demonic symbols are all over my screen😯😭and weird phone numbers keep calling me and there’s growls when I answer. I am so disappointed in this app and the memory it gives our w-w-w-wonderful Cheeto....oops I mean president

attributes.review: I thought this was gonna be a app for trump. But whenever I open it my phone glitches, and starts to play videos of annoying people saying racial slurs! But it gets worse! The next day I started feeling really ill. Whenever I cough it sounded like I was saying “he was just joking”. Very disappointed.
attributes.title: False advertising

attributes.review:
Hi upper east siders, it’s Gossip Girl here and I’m just here to say how horrible this app is. I don’t even know where to begin with this and I truly hope for your own safety you don’t download this. Of course America is a very racist country, but hey it’s free to all the white people out there. Preferably a white, middle aged man, Republican and Christian:) anyway that’s all for now, ta ta for now! 
Xoxo,

attributes.review: The app takes forever to load and once it does, the UI is the worst I’ve ever seen! Nothing is intuitive. Makes it extremely hard to use. It has is no way been beneficial. Not worth downloading AT ALL. Don’t waste your time on this. This app needs to get removed from the App Store
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app was supposed to provide me with extremely factual information, exactly like does Fox News, but instead all I saw on the platform was trash and junk! And a message to the president himself, when Ariana said just keep breathing she didn’t mean you! 🙃✨🧚❤️💅🇺🇸 Trump 2020 but one a gravestone ✨✨🇺🇸🧚💅😁
